column3: Latest;Thailand:------  The body of a Cambodian worker from Prey Veng named as Ath Sok
column6: 2019 on a plantation in * ------a Thai reader says  Chachoengsao------ province
column7: Thailand.------Initial sources reported that eight Cambodian workers came to work on the plantation
column9: and were staying in four huts.------It is reported that the victim may have been killed after a wild elephant attacked the huts.------The victim’s body has now been taken to the Thai hospital for a forensic examination. ------AMAPAPA------UPDATE: A body of a man and woman were found near the scene the following day
column10: and are also believed to be Cambodian nationals.
